name: wristy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a way of hitting the ball in tennis, cricket, etc.) using or involving a fast turning movement of the wrist: He's a fast skater and a wristy shooter, averaging over 30 goals per season. She's very wristy, but she's also powerful for such a slightly built player. The brushstrokes are made with a loose, wristy action.
More examplesFewer examplesHis wristy shot went straight past the defender and over the goalie's shoulder into the net. She has a strong backhand stroke and a wristy forehand that she uses when she approaches the net. The batsman showed off his wristy strength and dominating strokes all around the wicket.
